docs.snippet: Mets Manager Terry Collins took a reasonable gamble in starting the rookie Matz in trying to clinch the series against the Dodgers. Then the Mets’ bats fell silent....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mets Manager Terry Collins took a reasonable gamble in starting the rookie Matz in trying to clinch the series against the Dodgers. Then the Mets’ bats fell silent.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times holds New York Mets pitcher Steven Matz performed well in Game 4 of National League division series, though Los Angeles Dodgers won, 3-1, when Mets batters did not come through.

headline.main: Mets’ Young Experiment Steven Matz Runs Into Dodgers’ Ace
headline.print_headline: A Youthful Experiment Runs Up Against an Ace at His Best

docs.abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin scores United States and others for what he terms their lack of cooperation with Russian military intervention in Syria; says they have 'mush for brains;' Russia is being criticized for attacking Syrian rebels but not Islamic State.
